alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 06 at 6:02PM EST until January 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Northern Erie county. Greatest additional accumulations will be close to Lake Erie in the City of Buffalo. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel at times with snow covered roads and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4306 7847 4306 7870 4297 7898 4293 7897 4288 7889 4279 7890 4282 7878 4284 7866 4288 7862 4293 7848 TIME Y22M01D06T2100Z-Y22M01D07T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
